description: Islamic leader says event sends a message "to the whole world" that Ireland is a welcoming country.
title: Croke Park: Muslims celebrate Eid in the home of Irish sport
title_page: Croke Park: Muslims celebrate Eid in the home of Irish sport - BBC News
maintext: "No matter your diversity, no matter how different you are, once you come and you live here and you become part of the society, this island of Ireland has this great, unique ability to adopt you," the Islamic theologian added.
